languages.text: "Паскаль, что такого особенного в этой обители и реликвии? Что там могло заинтересовать дознавателя Инквизиции?"
"Pasqal, what is so special about the cenobium and the relic? What is in there that has drawn the attention of an Interrogator of the Inquisition?"
languages.original_text: "Паскаль, что такого особенного в этой обители и реликвии? Что там могло заинтересовать дознавателя Инквизиции?"

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal, what is so special about the Cenobium and the relic? What is in there that managed to attract the attention of an Inquisition interrogator?"
"Pasqal, what is so special about the Cenobium and the relic? What is in there that managed to attract the attention of an Inquisition interrogator?"

languages.text: "Pasqal, was ist an dem Cenobium und dem Relikt so besonders? Was daran hat die Aufmerksamkeit eines Interrogators der Inquisition geweckt?"
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, what is so special about the cenobium and the relic? What is in there that has drawn the attention of an Interrogator of the Inquisition?"

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal, was ist an dem Cenobium und dem Relikt so besonders? Was daran hat die Aufmerksamkeit eines Interrogators der Inquisition geweckt?"

languages.text: « Pasqal, qu'est-ce que le Cenobium et la relique ont de si spécial ? Qu'est-ce qui a attiré l'attention d'un interrogateur de l'Inquisition là-bas ? »
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, what is so special about the cenobium and the relic? What is in there that has drawn the attention of an Interrogator of the Inquisition?"

traits.locale_text: « Pasqal, qu'est-ce que le Cenobium et la relique ont de si spécial ? Qu'est-ce qui a attiré l'attention d'un interrogateur de l'Inquisition là-bas ? »

languages.text: “帕斯卡，这座修道院和里面的圣物有什么特别之处？它为什么会引起审判庭审讯官的注意？”
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, what is so special about the cenobium and the relic? What is in there that has drawn the attention of an Interrogator of the Inquisition?"

traits.locale_text: “帕斯卡，这座修道院和里面的圣物有什么特别之处？它为什么会引起审讯官的注意？”

languages.text: 「パスカル、その連生体と聖遺物のどこがそこまで特別なんだ？どの点が異端審問庁のインテロゲイターの注意を引いた？」
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, what is so special about the cenobium and the relic? What is in there that has drawn the attention of an Interrogator of the Inquisition?"

traits.locale_text: 「パスカル、その連生体と聖遺物のどこがそこまで特別なんだ？どの点が異端審問庁のインテロゲイターの注意を引いた？」

languages.text: «Pasqal, ¿qué tienen de especial el Cenobio y la reliquia? ¿Qué hay ahí que haya llamado la atención de un interrogador de la Inquisición?».
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, what is so special about the cenobium and the relic? What is in there that has drawn the attention of an Interrogator of the Inquisition?"

traits.locale_text: «Pasqal, ¿qué tienen de especial el cenobio y la reliquia? ¿Qué hay ahí que llamó la atención de un interrogador de la Inquisición?».

languages.text: "Pasqal, senobiyum ve yadigârı bu kadar özel kılan ne? Orada Engizisyon Sorgucusu'nun ilgisini çekmiş olan ne var?"
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, what is so special about the cenobium and the relic? What is in there that has drawn the attention of an Interrogator of the Inquisition?"

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal, senobiyum ve yadigârı bu kadar özel kılan ne? Orada Engizisyon Sorgucusu'nun ilgisini çekmiş olan ne var?"
